  Item 8.01.  Other Events.  
                             
On October 22, 2024, JPMorgan Chase & Co. closed public offerings of (i) $500,000,000 aggregate principal   
amount of Floating Rate Notes due 2028 (the “Floating Rate Notes”), (ii) $2,000,000,000 aggregate principal 
amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2028 (the “2028 Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes”), (iii)              
$2,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2030 (the “2030 Fixed-to-      
FloatingRate Notes”) and (iv) $3,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due  
2035 (together with the Floating Rate Notes, the 2028 Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes and the 2030 Fixed-to-    
FloatingRate Notes, the “Notes”). The offerings of the Notes were registered under the Securities Act of    
1933, as amended, pursuant to a registration statement on Form S-3(File No. 333-263304),as amended. In      
connection with these offerings, the legal opinion as to the legality of the Notes is being filed as Exhibit
5.1 to this report.                                                                                         
                                                  
  Item 9.01.  Financial Statements and Exhibits.  
                                                  
(d) Exhibits
